definition: (of a married couple) to have intercourse/(literary) to share the same room/of the same family branch
house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)

sentences.english: Scofield. Found you a new cellie.
He lay with with Hagar and she conceived;
sentences.chinese: 他與夏甲同房，夏甲就懷了孕。

sentences.english: So Boaz took Ruth and she became his wife.
sentences.chinese: 於是，波阿斯娶了路得爲妻，與她同房。

sentences.english: The marriage lasted only a week and was never consummated.
sentences.chinese: 那段婚姻僅維持了一星期，期間從未同房。

sentences.english: No additional charge for children under 12 years old sharing room with parents without extra bed.
sentences.chinese: 歲以下小童與父母同房而不需加牀者，不另收費。

sentences.english: And most importantly, make love with your husband several times a week.
sentences.chinese: 最重要的是每週要同房數次。

sentences.english: The man was less a groom than a chaperone: according to Jordanian government sources, the marriage was never consummated.
sentences.chinese: 據約旦政府的消息，婚後他倆從未同房。

sentences.english: And Adam knew his wife again; and she bare a son.
sentences.chinese: 亞當又與妻子同房，她就生了一個兒子。

sentences.english: Medicine to check after a week later in flow, and within a month the ban to her.
sentences.chinese: 藥流後複查在一週以後進行，在一個月之內禁止同房。

sentences.english: No additional charge for children under 12sharing room with Parents and utilizing existing beds.
sentences.chinese: 小童十二歲以下與父母同房而不須加牀者，不另收費。

sentences.english: And Adam knew his wife; and she conceived.
sentences.chinese: 有一日，那人和他妻子夏娃同房，夏娃就懷孕了。

sentences.english: A bear in her heart, her husband refused to immediately understand the reasons for her roommate had.
sentences.chinese: 她的心一緊，立即明白丈夫拒絕與她同房的原因了。

definition: euphemism for sexual intercourse/to go to bed with sb
to have sexual relations with sb/to have dealings with
(of a child bride) to consummate marriage
